All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Assistant
This class is used to model the assistant card that each player is supposed to play in order to establish their initiative and Mother Nature's movements
BeginTurnMessage
BeginTurnMessage used to send the game state during the match
CardType
THe enumeration for card types
CharacterCard
Class used to model the charter card in the expert version of the game
CharacterController
 
CharactersFlags
Character flags enumeration used to know what a character requires
CharacterStruct
The struct used to give to the character what they need to change
Cli
Cli class used to prints the updates
ClientHandler
ClientHandler class: It takes care of managing the communication with the associated client with the assigned socket It implements Runnable because each thread handles the communication with its client in parallel
ClientResponse
ClientResponse class used for generic message
ClientServerOutputReader
ClientServerOutputReader class takes care of the ASYNCHRONOUS communication with the server
ClientUserInput
ClientUserInput class takes care of the SYNCHRONOUS communication with the server
CliParser
CliParser class used to parse the message from server into printable string
CloudController
 
CloudTile
CloudTile class is the entity used to make the Cloud The number of clouds is equals to the numbers of players
Color
Color enumeration used for the students possible colors
Constants
Constants class used to have all the game constants in one place and make the code better
DiningRoom
This class is used to model the dining room
Effects
The effects used for character with their initial cost, number of students, the card type, the flags he/she needs
Entrance
This class is used to model the entrance in witch you can add students to bring them either to the islands or to the dining room
Eriantys
Eriantys is the main class of the project everything starts from here
FileReader
FileReader Class is created to allow the jar to correctly read the files into the resources
Game
Game class is the principal class of the model that contains every aspect of a match
GameCharacters
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of the game
GameController
 
GuiParser
 
InfoController
This class elaborates info messages
InfoRequestMessage
InfoRequestMessage used to require information
Island
The Island entity is used to simulate one of the island present in the game board where player can position students to grow influences and conquer them
IslandController
 
LoginController
LoginController control any kind of error incurring in the log in phase
LoginController
 
LoginMessage
LoginMessage class used for initial login
LoginMessageResponse
LoginMessageResponse used as a response form server to client
MainBoard
MainBoard class used to model everything shared between players
MainBoardCharacters
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of the gameBoard
MainController
Main controller class that manage the other controller and do the correct phase and correct player check
Message
 
MessageMain
Message main enumeration used to know the main type of a message
MessageParser
MessageParser class used to take a string from user and parse it into a message
MessageSecondary
The MessageSecondary enumeration is used to know what a player did
MotherNature
This class is used to model the character of Mother Nature
MoveController
Move controller class elaborates move messages and controls if they are correct
MoveMessage
MoveMessage used during a move from client to server
MoveMessageResponse
MoveMessageResponse used used a response from server to client
PhaseMessageResponse
PhaseMessageResponse class used as response about what to do next
Pinger
Class for ping the clients and detects the disconnections
Places
PLaces enumeration used for a move message in order to know where the student will be put and where take them
PlayController
PLayController class elaborate play messages
Player
The Player is the entity used to model the behaviour and action a person might do in the game.
PlayerBoard
This class is used to model the board that each player have composed by: ProfessorTable Entrance DiningRoom
PlayerBoardController
 
PlayerCharacters
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of a player
PlayMessage
PlayMessage class used from client to server to send a play move
PlayMessageResponse
PlayMessageResponse class used as a response from server to client
Server
Server Class: Once the server has been created with the parameters passed by the main server, it listens at the port and accepts every client connection.
ServerMain
ServerMain Class: This class setup the parameters passed from command line and creates the Server, if nothing is passed it takes the port number and the host address from json file (networkSettings.json)
ServerParserGUI
 
StudentsBag
The StudentsBag entity is used to simulate the bag present in the game from where players can pick random students to make various moves during the game itself
StudentsPlayerId
StudentsPlayerId class used to know who has the students
Team
The Team is the entity used to model the behaviour of those playing the game.
TimerThread
This class handle a timer for each client, when the timer is over a client disconnect with server Then this class send a disconnection message to all the clients
Towers
Enum Towers used for towers color
TurnManager
Turn manager class control and manage the turn of a player
View
The view interface
ViewMain
 
WinnerMessage
WinnerMessage to send who won
